title: Gearty Grilling: Nick Barr on Tuition Fees
itunes:author: Professor Nicholas Barr
description: Contributor(s): Professor Nicholas Barr | Nicholas Barr, Professor of Public Economics and architect of the student loan, explains why students should regard it as a graduate tax, rather than a debt.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Professor Nicholas Barr | Nicholas Barr, Professor of Public Economics and architect of the student loan, explains why students should regard it as a graduate tax, rather than a debt.
